lexUnit.name: groan.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: make a deep inarticulate sound in response to pain or despair.

sentence.text: He was groaning , ` Help me , help me " . "
` Oh shit , " he groaned .
` Oh , Jesus , that 's all we need , " Stephen groaned .
` Please , " he groaned .
My love , my darling ! " he groaned , muffled by her flesh .
` Oh God , " his mother groaned .
` Oh , heavens , " she groaned , seeing the visions below .
I 've missed you so much … ” he groaned .
` God , I feel terrible , " Robyn groaned , holding her head .
` Shut up , " Emmie groaned .
` There 's something in it , " he groaned miserably .
` Lindsey ! " he groaned , reaching out for her .
“ Oh , God … ! ” she groaned , blushing like mad and lowering her head to hide her face in his chest .
` Ohhhh , I 'll go , " groaned Paddy .
` Oooh ! " groaned Sam , the Spectacled Bear , ` I feel terrible ! "
` Oh Christ , " groaned Yanto , ` those boots were nearly bloody new .
` Some war , " groaned George .
` Oh , git the hankerchiefs out fer a weep , " groaned George , pretending to play the violin .
` I thought that was lunch , " groaned Zimmer .
` Thank you letters ! " groaned Anna .
` Oh God , " groaned Jenny , ` it 's Fat Dalziel . "
` The Copts will tell , " groaned Osman .
She heard Fen groan his own unbearable delight .
Because she was so tall and slim all the clothes looked marvellous on her and the other girls would groan their envy .
She howled in simulated anguish , and groaned her lament .
` After he got back I felt like I was in a black hole , " groaned a disconsolate Wilkinson after his two hour defeat .
` They have tanks and we have Kalashnikovs , " groaned one Bosnian soldier picking bullets for his Kalashnikov assault rifle from a sack before heading to the front .
She invites me into the living room , pours me a coffee , sits down beside me , slips her shoes off and groans about the working day she has just been through .
Well who are the ones that are moaning and groaning about it ?
After emerging from the sea for the fourth time he groaned about his physique .
Faye groaned exaggeratedly to him .
` I must be bloody mad , " he groaned to himself .
` For God 's sake , let's go , " he groaned to himself .
O God , I 've lost him , he groaned to himself , lost him .
Athelstan groaned to himself .
` O-oh ! " the youngsters groaned in disappointment , and went on discussing a blasphemous film they had seen .
` I thought this was supposed to be a happy birthday , " he groaned after making a mess of two strokes .
The girls groaned over this , except the quick ones like Irene who delighted in it , but it meant that there was no need for anyone to open the desk because it was all oral work .
